name: Tornado Driver
description:
"Tornado Driver" is an endless driver game with random and procedural generation!

Maps:

  • DESERT
  • BLIZZARD
  • WOODLAND

Objects:

  • GATE (+1 point)
  • SPIKE (Instant elimination)

It's a DIFFICULT game! There are also challenging achievements that will prove your skills.

Are you ready to reach the HIGHEST scores?
